category.name: Product Structure.QSearch Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_MAX_FACET_SIZE
preference.preference_description: Specifies the maximum number of facets of a JT that can be processed by the "create_or_update_bbox_and_tso" utility, in order to generate Trushape voxels and bounding boxes. The default value is 3000000.
